Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can represent a way for people to communicate over long distances using a string telephone.
The student can illustrate how the device uses sound to send information from one student to another.
The student can use the provided materials in their drawing to demonstrate the construction of the string telephone.
The student can show that the device includes features necessary for sending and receiving messages over a distance.
The student can depict how such communication devices are important for helping people connect over distances.
